cause.description:
Mackayla is a 12 year old girl who is in sick kids hostpital and has been there since June 19th, and has just received a new heart, this cause is for anyone who would just like to show that they care. You can donate money if you would like, but you dont have to because just think if you join Mackaylas going to be so happy because then she will no people care for her. There is a garage sale Saturday July 28th at 103 apple wood cresent,Guelph,Ont, ALL money goes towards Mackayla. Also there is a dinner on Sunday July 29th at the optimist club,Guelph,Ont, its 10 dollars and tickets are sold at shelldale or you can call Chris Margetson at 519-341-0295 or Tara Crawford at 519-362-3525 or e-mail Tara at taracrawford8@hotmail.com.
1. Mackayla is only 12,.......12!!
